RemediationStrings.Title: Defender exclusion paths must not contain certain values Value discovered was {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: To avoid performance and security issues, you must exclude certain files and processes from Microsoft Defender Antivirus scans. For more information, see the Common exclusion mistakes in Microsoft Defender Antivirus article.
